main.name: Rowan Smith
main.description: I am driven by a voracious thirst for knowledge and a passion for technology.
main.bio: I'm a developer working in Javascript, with knowledge various front and back end technologies. I collect Movies, Records, Video Games, and Books. I have a beautiful wife and two feline sons, Tuna and Mackerel
main.contactmessage: If you would like to get in contact with me, feel free to drop me a message below!

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: 20 week intensive Javascript-based boot camp. Learned technologies including React.js, jQuery, Node.js, Express, Java, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, and more.
Associate Editor of Murphy Square Literary and Arts Journal. Winner of the Engman Award in Fiction. Contributing writer for The Augsburg Echo newspaper.

work.title: Full Stack Development Student
work.description: Created a solo application, REWINDR, a database application for VHS tapes. Worked on a team to develop a scorekeeping application for HighTech Kids' Lego League Tournaments.

work.title: Bookseller
work.description: Bought and sold new and used media. Appraised items from the public. Managed specific sections. Merchandising in sections. Worked to maximize sales.

projects.title: REWINDR
projects.category: A cataloging application for VHS tapes

testimonials.text: Rowan exemplifies the Three I's: Intensity, Integrity, and Intelligence
testimonials.user: Olympic Gold Medalist and WWE Hall of Famer Kurt Angle
